name: Fuse Twap Bot
description: A multiplayer drawing game for the browser

ETHEREUM_ADMIN_ACCOUNT.description: Ethereum account that will post the prices to the oracle

ETHEREUM_ADMIN_PRIVATE_KEY.description: Private key of the account that will post the prices to the oracle

SUPPORTED_PAIRS.description: Comma-separated values of For example: FRAX/USDC (Uniswap), YFI/ETH (SushiSwap)
